title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Activity-Based STEM Education Design: Through Video Production

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more videos solving real-life problems by applying STEM concepts.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively evaluate STEM project videos using a peer assessment rubric.
Learners can analyze group participation metrics to adjust role balance within a team.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
